## binTableColumn() function

This function takes an arquero table and bins the values of a specified column into a fixed set of quantiles from 0-1.0. // TODO: use op.ntile??

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function binTableColumn(table: ColumnTable, column: string): any[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  table | ColumnTable | table to bin |
|  column | string | column to bin |

<b>Returns:</b>

any\[\]
